sqlMap.select: SELECT W.productid,ROUND(SUM(W.unitprice * W.quantity) / SUM(W.quantity),6) AS res04 FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE W.warehousetype = 1 AND W.productid = #productid# GROUP BY W.productid ORDER BY W.productid
select T.* from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1 and T.warehousetype = #warehousetype# and T.theme2 LIKE '%$theme2$%' ESCAPE '/' ORDER BY T.id
select T.* from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1 and id in ($ids$)
select SUM(T.quantity) as quantity,T.productid from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1 and productid = #productid#
select sum(quantity) from etb_warehouse where productid = #productid# and warehousetype in (1,2,6)

select * from ( SELECT * from etb_warehouse W where 1 = 1 and warehousetype in (3,5,6)
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
) A ORDER BY A.updatedate,A.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( SELECT * from etb_warehouse W where 1 = 1 and warehousetype in (3,5,6)
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
) B

select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,S.warehousename,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.warehouseamount,S.productid,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate, (select SS.suppliername from etb_supplier SS where SS.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername from ( SELECT W.productid,W.warehousename,SUM(W.quantity) AS warehouseamount FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1
W.parentid = #parentid#
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.productid = #productid#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
group by W.productid,W.warehousename ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid and S.warehouseamount > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
order by A.belongto,A.fieldno,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.item10,A.packaging,A.id asc

select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,S.productid,S.warehousename,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.warehouseamount,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate, (select SS.suppliername from etb_supplier SS where SS.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername from ( SELECT W.productid,W.warehousename,SUM(W.quantity) AS warehouseamount FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1
W.parentid = #parentid#
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.productid = #productid#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
group by W.productid,W.warehousename ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid and S.warehouseamount > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
order by A.belongto,A.fieldno,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.item10,A.packaging,A.id asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,S.productid,S.warehousename,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.warehouseamount,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate from ( SELECT W.productid,W.warehousename,SUM(W.quantity) AS warehouseamount FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1
W.parentid = #parentid#
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.productid = #productid#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
group by W.productid,W.warehousename ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid and S.warehouseamount > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
) B

select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.warehouseamount,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate from ( SELECT W.productid,SUM(W.quantity) AS warehouseamount FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1
W.parentid = #parentid#
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.productid = #productid#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
group by W.productid ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid and S.warehouseamount > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
ORDER BY A.updatedate,A.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.warehouseamount,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate from ( SELECT W.productid,SUM(W.quantity) AS warehouseamount FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1
W.parentid = #parentid#
W.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
W.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
W.theme1 = #theme1#
W.productid = #productid#
W.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
group by W.productid ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid and S.warehouseamount > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
) B

select count(*) from ( select sum(A.quantity) as quantity,A.suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.parentid,A.theme2 from ( select * from ( select T.*, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.suppliername like '%$suppliername$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A group by A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.parentid,A.theme2 ) B where 1 = 1 and B.quantity != 0

select * from ( select GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids,sum(A.quantity) as quantity,A.suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.plandate,A.parentid,A.theme2 from ( select * from ( select T.*, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.suppliername like '%$suppliername$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A group by A.tradename,A.productid,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.warehousename,A.plandate,A.parentid,A.theme2 ) AA where 1 = 1 and AA.quantity != 0 order by AA.suppliername asc,AA.parentid asc, AA.productid asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select * from ( select GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids,sum(A.quantity) as quantity,A.suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.plandate,A.parentid,A.theme2 from ( select * from ( select T.*, (select S.customername from etb_customer S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.suppliername like '%$suppliername$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A group by A.tradename,A.productid,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.warehousename,A.plandate,A.parentid,A.theme2 ) AA where 1 = 1 and AA.quantity != 0 order by AA.suppliername asc,AA.theme2 asc, AA.productid asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select sum(A.quantity) as quantity,A.suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.parentid,A.theme2 from ( select * from ( select T.*, (select S.customername from etb_customer S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.suppliername like '%$suppliername$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A group by A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.parentid,A.theme2 ) B where 1 = 1 and B.quantity != 0

select * from ( select id as ids,quantity,A.warehousetype,IF(A.warehousetype = 1, A.suppliername, A.customername) AS suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.item10,A.unit,A.makearea,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.wwd plandate from ( select * from ( select T.*, R.warehousedate wwd, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (SELECT S.customername FROM etb_customer S WHERE S.id = T.supplierid) as customername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item10, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea from etb_warehouse T left join etb_warehouserpt R on R.parentid like CONCAT("%",T.warehouseno,"%") where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A ) AA where 1 = 1 and AA.quantity != 0 order by AA.plandate desc

select * from ( select GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids,sum(A.quantity) as quantity,A.warehousetype,IF(A.warehousetype = 1, A.suppliername, A.customername) AS suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.item10,A.unit,A.makearea,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.plandate from ( select * from ( select T.*, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (SELECT S.customername FROM etb_customer S WHERE S.id = T.supplierid) as customername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item10, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A group by A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.item10,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.plandate,A.warehousetype ) AA where 1 = 1 and AA.quantity != 0 order by AA.tradename asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select sum(A.quantity) as quantity,A.warehousetype,A.suppliername,A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.item10,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename from ( select * from ( select T.*, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item10, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.status = #status#
) C where 1 = 1
C.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
C.color = #color#
) A group by A.tradename,A.typeno,A.color,A.packaging,A.item10,A.unit,A.supplierid,A.theme1,A.productid,A.warehousename,A.plandate,A.warehousetype ) B where 1 = 1 and B.quantity != 0

select T.* from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1 and warehousetype = #warehousetype# and T.status = #status# and T.productid = #productid# and T.supplierid = #supplierid# and T.warehousename = #warehousename#

select * from ( SELECT ifnull(S.beforequantityp+S.remainquantityp,0) AS quantityp,ifnull(S.inquantityp,0) AS inquantity,ifnull(S.outquantitys,0) AS outquantity,ifnull(S.beforequantitys+S.remainquantitys,0) AS quantitys,ifnull(S.quantityw,0) AS quantityw,S.plandate,T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate from ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.productid,SUM(P.inquantity) AS inquantityp,SUM(P.beforequantity) AS beforequantityp,SUM(P.remainquantity) AS remainquantityp,max(plandate) AS plandate FROM etb_purchaseitem P WHERE P.remainquantity >= 0 GROUP BY P.productid) S1 LEFT JOIN
(SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.productid as productids,SUM(S.outquantity) AS outquantitys,SUM(S.beforequantity) AS beforequantitys,SUM(S.remainquantity) AS remainquantitys FROM etb_salesitem S WHERE 1 = 1 and S.remainquantity >= 0 group by S.productid) S2) S3 ON S1.productid = S3.productids
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT W.productid as productidw,SUM(W.quantity) AS quantityw FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and warehousetype = '6' group by W.productid) S2) S4 ON S1.productid = S4.productidw
UNION SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.productid,SUM(P.inquantity) AS inquantityp,SUM(P.beforequantity) AS beforequantityp,SUM(P.remainquantity) AS remainquantityp,max(plandate) AS plandate FROM etb_purchaseitem P WHERE P.remainquantity >= 0 GROUP BY P.productid) S1
RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.productid as productids,SUM(S.outquantity) AS outquantitys,SUM(S.beforequantity) AS beforequantitys,SUM(S.remainquantity) AS remainquantitys FROM etb_salesitem S WHERE 1 = 1 and S.remainquantity >= 0 group by S.productid) S2) S3 ON S1.productid = S3.productids
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT W.productid as productidw,SUM(W.quantity) AS quantityw FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and warehousetype = '6' group by W.productid) S2) S4 ON S1.productid = S4.productidw ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid or T.id = S.productids ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
A.fieldno = #theme1#
A.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
ORDER BY A.updatedate,A.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select * from ( SELECT ifnull(S.beforequantityp+S.remainquantityp,0) AS quantityp,ifnull(S.inquantityp,0) AS inquantity,ifnull(S.outquantitys,0) AS outquantity,ifnull(S.beforequantitys+S.remainquantitys,0) AS quantitys,ifnull(S.quantityw,0) AS quantityw,S.plandate,T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate from ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.productid,SUM(P.inquantity) AS inquantityp,SUM(P.beforequantity) AS beforequantityp,SUM(P.remainquantity) AS remainquantityp,max(plandate) AS plandate FROM etb_purchaseitem P WHERE P.remainquantity >= 0 GROUP BY P.productid) S1 LEFT JOIN
(SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.productid as productids,SUM(S.outquantity) AS outquantitys,SUM(S.beforequantity) AS beforequantitys,SUM(S.remainquantity) AS remainquantitys FROM etb_salesitem S WHERE 1 = 1 and S.remainquantity >= 0 group by S.productid) S2) S3 ON S1.productid = S3.productids
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT W.productid as productidw,SUM(W.quantity) AS quantityw FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and warehousetype = '6' group by W.productid) S2) S4 ON S1.productid = S4.productidw
UNION SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.productid,SUM(P.inquantity) AS inquantityp,SUM(P.beforequantity) AS beforequantityp,SUM(P.remainquantity) AS remainquantityp,max(plandate) AS plandate FROM etb_purchaseitem P WHERE P.remainquantity >= 0 GROUP BY P.productid) S1
RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.productid as productids,SUM(S.outquantity) AS outquantitys,SUM(S.beforequantity) AS beforequantitys,SUM(S.remainquantity) AS remainquantitys FROM etb_salesitem S WHERE 1 = 1 and S.remainquantity >= 0 group by S.productid) S2) S3 ON S1.productid = S3.productids
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT W.productid as productidw,SUM(W.quantity) AS quantityw FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and warehousetype = '6' group by W.productid) S2) S4 ON S1.productid = S4.productidw ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid or T.id = S.productids ) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.color = #color#
A.fieldno = #theme1#
A.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
) B

select T.* from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.parentid = #parentid#
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.productid = #productid#
T.status = #status#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
order by T.warehousedate desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from etb_warehouse T where 1 = 1
T.parentid = #parentid#
T.warehousetype = #warehousetype#
T.warehouseno = #warehouseno#
T.theme1 = #theme1#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.productid = #productid#
T.status = #status#
T.warehousename like '%$warehousename$%' ESCAPE '/'
select * from etb_warehouse where id = #id#
select * from etb_warehouse where parentid = #parentid# and productid = #productid#

select * from etb_warehouse where parentid = #parentid#
res05 = #res05#
select * from etb_warehouse where warehouseno = #warehouseno#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM etb_warehouse WHERE parentid = #parentid#
productid = #productid#
status = #status#
sqlMap.update: update etb_warehouse set warehouseno = #warehouseno#, plandate = #plandate#, warehousename = #warehousename#, quantity = #quantity#, actualquantity = #actualquantity#, unitprice = #unitprice#, amount = #amount#, productid = #productid#, taxamount = #taxamount#, note = #note#, rank = #rank#, status = #status#, res01 = #res01#, res02 = #res02#, res03 = #res03#, res04 = #res04#, res05 = #res05#, res06 = #res06#, res07 = #res07#, res08 = #res08#, res09 = #res09#, res10 = #res10#, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where id = #id#
